title: Panel
medium:
Medium: silk, metal-wrapped silk, and metal embroidery on silk foundation
Technique: embroidered in satin, chain, knot, stem, and couching stitches on 7&1 satin foundation
description: Two scenes from the Labors of Hercules: in the lower left corner, Hercules with the three-headed dog, and in the lower right corner, Hercules wrestling with a lion.  A monkey sits between these two scenes, while a deer, a warthog, and a dog fill the background.  Framed by a curving border of berries.
name: Panel
